snippet.title: ARREST SATAN in SHOTGUN COP MAN | From the Creator of My Friend Pedro
snippet.description:
From the Creator of My Friend Pedro comes Shotgun Cop Man. Coming to Nintendo Switch & PC in 2025. Wishlist now and play the demo on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2966850

Join the community on Discord: https://discord.gg/DeadToastEntertainment

GO TO HELL, ARREST SATAN. Propel yourself to justice and glory on a journey through hell in this punchy, crunchy, son-of-a-gun precision platformer from the creator of My Friend Pedro.

Game Overview
Blast your way through hell in Shotgun Cop Man, a precision platformer where your weapons are your wings. Embark on a mission to arrest Satan armed with a devastating arsenal and a relentless thirst for glory. Propel yourself through hordes of irritable demons, devious traps, and thrilling challenges using the only two things you can trust: your wits and your weapons. Conquer the handcrafted campaign or dive into user-generated levels in this fire and brimstone-fueled mission to serve justice.

Firepower Propulsion
Master your movement through the twisted corners of hell as every shot propels you forward. Whether dodging enemies, scaling walls, or leaping impossible gaps, your weapons are the key to both survival and traversal.

Explosive Campaign and Challenges
Dive into an action-packed campaign in over 150 levels and face off against intense boss battles, then put yourself to the test and beat all the No Damage, Speedrun and Kill All challenges. Keep the infernal fun alive with an ever expanding choice of devious user-generated campaigns.

Create Your Own Hellish Playground
Let your creativity shine with the built-in level editor and Steam Workshop integration. Craft, share, and conquer custom levels to push the game and your peers to their limits.

Visit our website for more info: https://www.shotguncopman.com/
